meta.name: Christmas University Challenge
meta.description: Christmas University Challenge is a Christmas-themed quiz for distinguished university alumni.

videos.title: Durham v Manchester
videos.overview: The festive series begins with a match between Christmas 2024's champions Durham and Series 10 runners-up Manchester. Amol Rajan asks the questions.

videos.title: UCL v Leeds
videos.overview: Alumni teams from UCL and Leeds reunite for a second chance at being crowned Christmas University Challenge champions. Amol Rajan asks the questions.

videos.title: Keble College, Oxford v Hull
videos.overview: Keble College, Oxford play Hull in another Christmas match. Anne-Marie Imafidon and Joanna Nadin lead the teams, and Amol Rajan asks the questions.

videos.title: Trinity College, Cambridge v Bristol
videos.overview: The first ever Christmas series champions, from Trinity College, Cambridge, return to take on the Bristol team from Series 8. Amol Rajan asks the questions.

videos.title: Exeter College, Oxford v Trinity Hall, Cambridge
videos.overview: Teams from Exeter College, Oxford, led by Reeta Chakrabarti, and Trinity Hall, Cambridge, captained by Adam Mars-Jones, return to compete again. Amol Rajan asks the questions.

videos.title: St Hilda's College, Oxford v Edinburgh
videos.overview: Val McDermid captains a team from St Hilda's College, Oxford, and Cath Slessor leads a team of Edinburgh alumni. Amol Rajan asks the questions.

videos.title: Middlesex v Lancaster
videos.overview: In the final heat, Series 13 champions Middlesex face a Lancaster team that reached the semi-finals of Series 3. Amol Rajan asks the questions.

videos.title: Semi-Final 1
videos.overview: It's the first semi-final of this special all-star seasonal series. Two of the highest-scoring winning teams from the heats return to play again. Amol Rajan asks the questions.

videos.title: Semi-Final 2
videos.overview: Another two teams of notable alumni return to contest the second semi-final. Amol Rajan asks the questions.

videos.title: Final
videos.overview: It's the grand final of the 2025 Christmas competition. Who will be crowned champion of this all-star series? Amol Rajan asks the questions.
